about_the_game:
■ Gameplay
- Survive among sinking islands. outer islands will tend to sink.
- Collect various item and use it to escape from islands.
- Craft the raft and Escape the islands before volcano eruption.

■Characteristic
- Realtime base status system with Debuffs.
- Random weathers.
- Limited resources.
- sinking islands after time passes
- Dangerous environment.

■ Caution
- This game does not support English language.
- Most of information about this game is in tutorial. You can open it again as you want, but please read carefully before play.
- This game made for student portfolio. no update or bugfix after release.
